index.title: Galleria App using .Net SDK - Windows - Dev Center - Appacitive
index.description: A simple gallery application demoing Appacitive Core's data store, users and file features using .Net SDK.
index.keywords: gallery, gallery sample, upload file, upload, file, .net, samples, .net samples, .net sdk samples, appacitive, .net sdk
index.header_app_description: Learn how to create a simple photo gallery application using Appacitive as the backend to persist data.
